name: Demon King's Minions
description: The Black Cloak Demon King's devoted retainers. Inherited part of the Demon King's power and violent personality. There's evidence of their crimes on every planet.

skills.name: Mutual Sacrifice: Demise's Storm
skills.description: Deals minor Physical DMG to one designated target and units adjacent to the target.

skills.name: Mutual Sacrifice: Fading Fate
skills.description: Deals minor Physical DMG to all targets. A portion of reduced HP of targets hit is converted to "<u>Corrosion</u>."

skills.name: Prayers For Me
skills.description: Resists Crowd Control debuffs. When "Black Cloak Demon King" uses "Demise's Storm" or "Fading Fate" again, if this unit was summoned by the current attack and is in a "Mutual Sacrifice" state, then "Black Cloak Demon King" also attacks. It is absorbed after this, restoring HP that was converted to <u>"Entangled By Agony"</u> and gaining "<u>Calamity Power</u>."

skills.name: Libations For Me
skills.description: Receives the killing blow when "Enfettered" is active. If "Black Cloak Demon King"'s <u>"Calamity Power"</u> stacks are not 0, this unit is immediately resummoned and enters "Enfettered" state, but will cause "Black Cloak Demon King" to lose 1 <u>"Calamity Power"</u> stack and a certain proportion of HP. When "Black Cloak Demon King" uses "Cry Not for the Discarded," it is absorbed, and restores HP that was converted to <u>"Entangled By Agony"</u>.
